00052 @interface ARSpatialStateManager : NSObject {
00053 @private
00054         id <ARSpatialStateManagerDelegate> delegate;
00055         BOOL delegateRespondsToLocationDidUpdate;
00056         ARPoint3D EFToECEFSpaceOffset;
00057 
00058         BOOL updating;
00059 #if SPATIAL_STATE_MANAGER_MODE == SPATIAL_STATE_MANAGER_MODE_DEVICE
00060         CLLocationManager *locationManager;
00061 #else if SPATIAL_STATE_MANAGER_MODE == SPATIAL_STATE_MANAGER_MODE_SIMULATOR
00062         NSTimer *updateTimer;
00063 #endif
00064         
00065         ARAccelerometerFilter *upDirectionFilter;
00066         AROrientationFilter *orientationFilter;
00067 
00068         // Details about the last determined location
00069         BOOL locationAvailable;
00070         BOOL locationReliable;
00071         NSTimeInterval locationTimeIntervalSinceReferenceDate;
00072         CLLocationDistance locationAccuracy;
00073         CLLocationDegrees latitude;
00074         CLLocationDegrees longitude;
00075         CLLocationDistance altitude;
00076         
00077         // Details about the last determined up direction
00078         BOOL upDirectionAvailable;
00079         ARPoint3D lastUpDirectionInDeviceSpace;
00080         
00081         // Details about the last determined north direction
00082         BOOL northDirectionAvailable;
00083         ARPoint3D lastNorthDirectionInDeviceSpace;
00084         
00085         // Details about the last determined orientation
00086         BOOL orientationAvailable;
00087         NSTimeInterval orientationTimeIntervalSinceReferenceDate;
00088         ARQuaternion ENUToDeviceSpaceQuaternion;
00089         
00090         // Details about the current spatial state
00091         NSDate *timestamp;
00092         ARSpatialState *spatialState;
00093 }
